news.content:
Listen to ThreeFold co-founder Kristof de Spiegeleer on the Corporate Unplugged podcast.

Corporate Unplugged puts the light on impact makers in business, with past guests such as Simon Sinek & Seth Godin.
news.excerpt: ThreeFold co-founder Kristof de Spiegeleer appeared on the Corporate Unplugged podcast, with previous guests Simon Sinek and Seth Godin.

previous.title: TF Grid 2.3.0 is live!
previous.excerpt: The release introduces some improvements to the grid’s stability, new features, and testnet resource additions. You can read more within!

next.title: ThreeFold x Conscious Communities
next.excerpt: We’re in talks with an already-live, large-scale "conscious community" project to create their own independent grid of capacity!
